text: 4.30: Ais 63.10; Ro 8.23; Ef 1.13-14; 1 Te 5.19Nde ndava simtɨgar Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaarar nɨɨŋ thari. Fhe Bakɨme nden won mbuiav, won Ŋina Ŋaarar nde nɨɨŋgim, ana nden vhen ki. Ana Ŋina Ŋaar nden vhen ki, ne khaŋ muuŋgi, nde ana gumgi gu mbigi ma. Ana nen nde khɨvɨr zav, ana tuga sarigi. Ana mba tugar nde ndigip, nden muuŋgirim, nde guigira bɨkbɨɨgirga.
